text: Company View: added a "Company" tab in "People" to find and connect with all Company Members. Filter based on email addresses.
Company View: added the option to turn off account visibility.
SRM (Sharekey Rights Management): Improved modal to better manage Viewer, Editor or Admin roles.
Group Calls: Channels with active calls are now displayed at the top for improved accessibility.
PDF Annotations: added Select All / Clear All options when selecting Members.
PDF Annotations: updated highlighter colours for better visibility.
